content.rendered: LIGSM – 800C is a single board solution based on SIM800C Module with inbuilt trace antenna. It supports Quad-band 850/900/1800/1900MHz, it can transmit Voice, SMS and data information with low power consumption.

excerpt.rendered:
• Supply voltage range 3.4 ~ 4.4V
  • Operation temperature:-40C ~85C
  • Dimensions: 60mmx40mm
  • Compliant to GSM phase 2/2+
  • Control via AT commands
